alt: Mum drinking a milkshake and getting it all over her chin.
caption: Mum - happy 63rd birthday!

alt: Mum sitting in front of a birthday cake with a tiara on.
caption: There's been so many great birthdays over the years...

alt: Family photo of three people celebrating a birthday in the early 2000s.
caption: And you've always put so much love into ours...

alt: Mum looking at a cupcake.
caption: So we've tried to put as much love as we can into yours, too...
Even though we're not together this year, we're giving you a big squeeze across the miles, and we want to tell you how amazing you are...

alt: Mum, Alexander and I at the cinema.
caption: You're the best cinema companion...

alt: Mum and I in a selfie-style photo in Cineplex cinema.
caption: And we've seen so many awesome movies together...

alt: Mum, Alexander and I laughing in front of the Ritz Cinema.
caption: You're the best at making us laugh...

alt: Alexander and Mum giggling on the sofa
caption: And laugh...

alt: Grandma, Mum, Alexander and I laughing together in a FaceTime screenshot
caption: And laugh...

alt: Alexander and Mum laughing on the sofa
caption: And laugh...

alt: Mum and Grandma laughing together in the garden
caption: And laugh...

alt: Mum, Alexander and I at the beach
caption: We always have the best time with you...

alt: Mum, Alexander and I at Stourhead
caption: Wherever we go...

alt: Mum, Grandma, Alexander and I at Christmas
caption: Whatever time of year...

alt: Alexander and I wearing blue outfits
caption: You and Grandma raised us to be the best versions of ourselves...

alt: A photo of Mum pushing a young Alexander on a bike
caption: You've always encouraged us to follow our dreams...

alt: A family photo of Mum, Alexander and I on holiday in Florida
caption: And took us on the best holidays...

alt: Mum, Alexander, Marie-Pierre and I at the Core
caption: And thanks to you now we have an awesome in life in Calgary...

alt: Mum and her cat, Bear
caption: Over the years our family has grown...

alt: Mum and Paul
caption: And grown...

alt: Mum, Paul, Grandma, Marie-Pierre and I at a cafe in Burnham-on-Sea
caption: And continues to grow...

alt: A family photo at a wedding
caption: And grow...

alt: A selfie of Mum, Alexander and I
caption: We love you so much...

alt: Mum with a pina colada
caption: And we hope you can enjoy a pina colada on your special day...

alt: Mum with a pina colada
caption: Or two...

alt: Mum with a pina colada
caption: Or three...

alt: Mum with a balloon hat at TGI Fridays
caption: But not TOO many...

alt: Mum, Paul, Alexander and I in Banff
caption: And we can't wait to see you in November!
